name: Cloning
description: replace random affix with exact copy of another random affix. Item must be chosen first.

name: Scourging
description: add random negative affix, then min equivalent-value positive affix.

name: Combination
description: the affixes of 2 chosen items are randomly distributed across the 2 items, ignoring base limitations. Items must be chosen first.

name: Fate
description: reroll a random affix, retaining the original affix's point value as the minimum point value for the new affix. Item must be chosen first.

name: Empowerment
description: randomly apply 1 upgrade point; if impossible, adds new random affix. Item must be chosen first.

name: Attunement
description: Turn any non-relic into a relic, dynamically building thematic affixes as needed

name: Learning
description: Instantly level one of your relic slots or one of your attuned items; reroll if none in party

name: Negation
description: Random affix is negated, resultant points are distributed randomly. Item must be chosen first.

name: Brittleness
description: Body armour gets -1 AC and random hard-tripled affix added to its base item

name: Experimentation
description: A random affix evolves into its experimental form [prompt = 'Design a homebrew $class archetype for dungeons & dragons 5th edition inspired by a magic item with the following properties:']. The same affix will always evolve into the same effect. Item must be chosen first.

name: Scouring
description: A random affix is rerolled into a new crafted affix with the $affinity Affinity, ignoring the point value of the original affix. Item must be chosen first.

name: Customisation
description: Adds a new crafted affix of the $affinity Affinity.

name: Synergy
description: Choose two items. A random affix from a random one of them is copied onto the other item, at its lowest point value (ignoring polarity). Items must be chosen first.

name: Adventure
description: A dormant, unknown affix of the $affinity Affinity is added to an item, with a minimum point value of 2. It is revealed and unlocked the next time you complete a random mission (chosen now).

name: Refinement
description: A random affix is rerolled into a new crafted affix of an Affinity based on the rough Affinities of the original affix. The item must be chosen first.

name: Blunting
description: A non-conduit weapon has its dmg die size reduced by 1 and gains a random hard-doubled affix added to its base item.

name: Optimisation
description: An item with at least two affixes has a random one of its highest point-value affixes tiered up, and a respective number of points removed randomly from the other affixes on the item. The item must be chosen first.
